response:
Multifocal central nervous system involvement (optic nerve plus brainstem with internuclear ophthalmoplegia) in a young woman strongly suggests relapsing-remitting multiple sclerosis; vascular and structural pontine lesions, other inflammatory demyelinating disorders, systemic vasculitis, and an independent autoimmune hypothyroidism explaining her cold intolerance and dry skin must also be considered.

differential_diagnosis = ["Relapsing-remitting multiple sclerosis", "Left pontine ischaemic stroke", "Intrinsic brainstem tumour of the left pons (e.g., glioma or cavernoma)", "Neuromyelitis optica spectrum disorder", "Systemic autoimmune or vasculitic disorder with CNS involvement", "Primary hypothyroidism (e.g., autoimmune thyroiditis)"]
